title: Liro IT AB // Co-founder
description: My ongoing transition from architect to web developer is a pursuit of a nearly life-long dream of coding. My partner and I co-founded LIRO IT AB a few years ago. While he, a seasoned computer engineer, has been focusing on consulting, my role involves expanding the company's scope with my experience and the skill set I am currently acquiring through my studies.

title: Ängelholms kommun // Cultural Heritage Strategist, building permits
description: During my years at Ängelholm Municipality, I played a central role in cultural heritage work, most recently as a Cultural Heritage Strategist. I have handled cases, coordinated building permit matters in complex projects, and participated in budget work and development projects. My role has often been leading, educational, and developmental.

title: Lloyd's arkitektkontor AB // Architect
description: As an employee at a small architectural firm, you need to be quick to switch between various tasks. Whether it's designing parking structures or urban greenery, detailing a private villa, procuring, managing, or ordering IT products or services, the key is flexibility!

title: One-man-Business // Designer
description: As a platform for my own illustration and design projects, whether graphic or architectural, I started a sole proprietorship in 2016.

title: Tillberg Design AB // Architect
description: As an architect at Tillberg Design in Höganäs, I worked with international clients and in international workgroups. I was architect of specific areas on cruise ships. I was responsible for CAD training within the company, and a key person in developing a new CAD standard. During my time at Tillberg, I was trained to work conceptually, plan projects and to work in teams.

title: Europakontoret i Skåne AB
description: With my parents at the helm, Europakontoret was a family business with a wide range of activities. The small format was characterized by the need for constant ad hoc solutions and adaptability to various roles and tasks.

title: Karin Petterssons Arkitektbyrå, Inter IKEA Systems Service AB
description: The internships at IKEA's department of architecture and with a local architectural firm were my first acquaintances with life as an architect.
